titles: Monsieur St. Ruth's speech to the Irish Army, on the 11th of July, 1691. Being the day before the battel at Aghrint, as it was found among the papers of his secretary, who was killed in the battel.
author: St. Ruth, Charles Chalmont, marquis de, d. 1691.
notes: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Ireland --  History --  War of 1689-1691 --  Campaigns --  Sources.
